speaker: DUKE ORSINO

string: For so you shall be, while you are a man;
speaker: DUKE ORSINO

string: But when in other habits you are seen,
speaker: DUKE ORSINO

string: Orsino's mistress and his fancy's queen.
speaker: DUKE ORSINO

string: Exeunt all, except Clown
Clown
speaker: Clown

string: [Sings]
speaker: Clown

string: When that I was and a little tiny boy,
speaker: Clown

string: With hey, ho, the wind and the rain,
speaker: Clown

string: A foolish thing was but a toy,
speaker: Clown

string: For the rain it raineth every day.
speaker: Clown

string: But when I came to man's estate,
speaker: Clown

string: With hey, ho,  & c.
speaker: Clown

string: 'Gainst knaves and thieves men shut their gate,
speaker: Clown

string: For the rain,  & c.
speaker: Clown

string: But when I came, alas! to wive,
speaker: Clown

string: With hey, ho,  & c.
speaker: Clown

string: By swaggering could I never thrive,
speaker: Clown

string: For the rain,  & c.
speaker: Clown

string: But when I came unto my beds,
speaker: Clown

string: With hey, ho,  & c.
speaker: Clown

string: With toss-pots still had drunken heads,
speaker: Clown

string: For the rain,  & c.
speaker: Clown

string: A great while ago the world begun,
speaker: Clown

string: With hey, ho,  & c.
speaker: Clown

string: But that's all one, our play is done,
speaker: Clown

string: And we'll strive to please you every day.
speaker: Clown

string: Exit
